short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Why take a print screen when you can download the original image. Pick Local should help you to download the images with one click!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Why take a print screen when you can download the original image.
Pick Local should help you to download the images with one click!

Usage:
Mac:  one-time 'ctrl + ;'  and click on the green area
Windows: one-time 'ctrl + ;'  and click on the green area

Not supported media: 
   - Blob

Supported media:
  - jpeg, png, jpg, gif, svg, ico, webp
  - m3u8, mov, avi, wmv, flv, 3gp, mp4, mpg
